name: raumplanx
description: The Raumplan that combines the [Frontend](https://github.com/NilsGke/raumplan2) and the [Backend](https://github.com/NilsGke/raumplan2Server)

scripts.workflow: npm ci && cd client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.firstSetup: npm install && cd client && npm install && npm run build && cd .. && npm run start
